events.message: We have received the application from the candidate interested in the software engineer position. The resume indicates strong experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's extensive developer and software skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate and manage the interview scheduling process.
The initial phone screening was completed successfully. The candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software development and DevOps practices.
The candidate's technical interview has been scheduled for next week to further evaluate their engineering and problem-solving skills.
